getNavigation

Navigation getNavigation(boolean create)
Retrieves the navigation for the given site, and optionally creates it.

Parameters:
create - if navigation doesn't exist, create it.
Returns:
the navigation associated with the site. Can return null if navigation doesn't exist and the parameter create is false.

getSecurityRestriction

SecurityRestriction getSecurityRestriction(SecurityRestriction.Type type)
Parameters:
type - Type of SecurityRestriction object to obtain
Returns:
The SecurityRestriction object. Can be null if site is public

Updates security restrictions for the site.

Parameters:
securirtyRestriction - SecurityRestriction object to update. Cannot be null
